69.movie_plot: In order to get out of the snobby clique that is destroying her good-girl reputation, an intelligent teen teams up with a dark sociopath in a plot to kill the cool kids.

59.movie_plot: A noble underachiever and a beautiful valedictorian fall in love the summer before she goes off to college.

65.movie_plot: A coverup and witchhunt occur after a politician accidentally kills his mistress.

58.movie_plot: The Buckmans are a midwestern family all dealing with their lives: estranged relatives, raising children, pressures of the job, and learning to be a good parent and spouse.

64.movie_plot: A group of Southern California high school students are enjoying their most important subjects: sex, drugs and rock n' roll.

55.movie_plot: In 1965, an unorthodox and irreverent DJ named Adrian Cronauer begins to shake up things when he is assigned to the U.S. Armed Services radio station in Vietnam.

68.movie_plot: Two friends who are dissatisfied with their jobs decide to join the army for a bit of fun.

67.movie_plot: A group of seven former college friends gather for a weekend reunion at a South Carolina winter house after the funeral of one of their friends.

61.movie_plot: In 2002, two rival Olympic ice skaters were stripped of their gold medals and permanently banned from men's single competition. Presently, however, they've found a loophole that will allow them to qualify as a pairs team.

60.movie_plot: The relationship between Sid Vicious, bassist for British punk group The Sex Pistols, and his girlfriend Nancy Spungen is portrayed.

63.movie_plot: A family's home is haunted by a host of ghosts.

57.movie_plot: To save her ill son, a field mouse must seek the aid of a colony of rats, with whom she has a deeper link than she ever suspected.

66.movie_plot: A girl's "sweet" sixteenth birthday becomes anything but special, as she suffers from every embarrassment possible.

72.movie_plot: The story of the original Mercury 7 astronauts and their macho, seat-of-the-pants approach to the space program.

56.movie_plot: A film following the lives of two inner-city Chicago boys who struggle to become college basketball players on the road to going professional.

29.movie_plot: A team of commandos on a mission in a Central American jungle find themselves hunted by an extraterrestrial warrior.

2.movie_plot: "The Dude" Lebowski, mistaken for a millionaire Lebowski, seeks restitution for his ruined rug and enlists his bowling buddies to help get it.

49.movie_name: Star Trek IV: The Voyage Home (1986)
49.movie_plot: To save Earth from an alien probe, Admiral James T. Kirk and his fugitive crew go back in time to San Francisco in 1986 to retrieve the only beings who can communicate with it: humpback whales.

45.movie_plot: A teenager has to deal with his girlfriend dumping him among family crises, homicidal paper boys, and a rival skier.

18.movie_plot: During a preview tour, a theme park suffers a major power breakdown that allows its cloned dinosaur exhibits to run amok.

25.movie_plot: In London, four very different people team up to commit armed robbery, then try to doublecross each other for the loot.

34.movie_plot: Will Hunting, a janitor at M.I.T., has a gift for mathematics, but needs help from a psychologist to find direction in his life.

30.movie_plot: A cyborg, identical to the one who failed to kill Sarah Connor, must now protect her ten year old son, John Connor, from a more advanced cyborg.

32.movie_plot: A poor village under attack by bandits recruits seven unemployed samurai to help them defend themselves.

28.movie_plot: John McClane, officer of the NYPD, tries to save his wife Holly Gennaro and several others that were taken hostage by German terrorist Hans Gruber during a Christmas party at the Nakatomi Plaza in Los Angeles.

44.movie_plot: Harry and Sally have known each other for years, and are very good friends, but they fear sex would ruin the friendship.

31.movie_plot: A toon-hating detective is a cartoon rabbit's only hope to prove his innocence when he is accused of murder.

37.movie_plot: Babe, a pig raised by sheepdogs, learns to herd sheep with a little help from Farmer Hoggett.

9.movie_plot: Selfish yuppie Charlie Babbitt's father left a fortune to his savant brother Raymond and a pittance to Charlie; they travel cross-country.

38.movie_plot: A former L.A. drug dealer tries to go straight but his past and his underworld connections bring him into the focus of the DEA, the Mexican feds and the Mexican drug cartels.

13.movie_plot: Jerry Lundegaard's inept crime falls apart due to his and his henchmen's bungling and the persistent police work of the quite pregnant Marge Gunderson.

1.movie_plot: A high school wise guy is determined to have a day off from school, despite what the Principal thinks of that.

6.movie_plot: Wallace falls for Wendolene, a wool shop owner, while Gromit is framed for the sheep rustling.

52.movie_plot: 57 years later, Ellen Ripley is rescued by a deep salvage team during her hypersleep. The moon from the original movie has been colonized, but contact is lost. This time, colonial marines have impressive firepower, but will that be enough?

33.movie_plot: Three former parapsychology professors set up shop as a unique ghost removal service.

19.movie_name: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back (1980)
19.movie_plot: After the rebels are overpowered by the Empire on the ice planet Hoth, Luke Skywalker begins Jedi training with Yoda. His friends accept shelter from a questionable ally as Darth Vader hunts them in a plan to capture Luke.

47.movie_plot: A snobbish investor and a wily street con artist find their positions reversed as part of a bet by two callous millionaires.

5.movie_plot: A troubled child summons the courage to help a friendly alien escape Earth and return to his home world.

14.movie_plot: Federal Agent Eliot Ness sets out to stop Al Capone; because of rampant corruption, he assembles a small, hand-picked team.

43.movie_plot: Wallace is used by a criminal penguin in a robbery involving mechanical trousers.

15.movie_name: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi (1983)

21.movie_plot: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

7.movie_plot: NASA must devise a strategy to return Apollo 13 to Earth safely after the spacecraft undergoes massive internal damage putting the lives of the three astronauts on board in jeopardy.

24.movie_plot: When a childless couple of an ex-con and an ex-cop decide to help themselves to one of another family's quintuplets, their lives become more complicated than they anticipated.

48.movie_name: Star Trek: The Wrath of Khan (1982)
48.movie_plot: With the assistance of the Enterprise crew, Admiral Kirk must stop an old nemesis, Khan Noonien Singh, from using the life-generating Genesis Device as the ultimate weapon.

40.movie_name: Life Is Beautiful (La Vita è bella) (1997)

39.movie_plot: A veteran British barrister must defend his client in a murder trial that has surprise after surprise.
